Title: Ghosts
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Gavin Harris, Gwen Sigan (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Jesse Lee Soffer, Tracy Spiridakos
Plot: Upton resumes an undercover identity to take down a meth ring run by a former criminal contact; Voight calls in a favor for Olinsky when pressure from Woods mounts.
